Hey, I’m Israel Ogbole

I use this space to share personal thoughts and experiences with Open Source Software, Raspberry Pi, Cloud-native technologies, and life in general.
Also, I will journal Naomi's programming journey here. Naomi is my nine-year-old daughter who loves coding.
